Today i found this masterpiece.... long long ago, i made my own textadventures with basic... good old times. This program is very intuitive and easy, so its fun to play with it. But i want to ask: Is there a possibility to play the games on a mobilephone? Or without the program? Like an old .bat file where you only have to run the file and can play?

I found some textadventures in the app store of google, some interpreters... but to be honest, i dont have a clue how this could work. Anyone an idea? 

Thanks,
Lyrao
